testcase.name: testActivityLaunches
testcase.failure: androidx.test.espresso.base.RootViewPicker$RootViewWithoutFocusException: Waited for the root of the view hierarchy to have window focus and not request layout for 10 seconds. If you specified a non default root matcher, it may be picking a root that never takes focus.
